import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QRViewer=()=>{const[qrUrl,setQrUrl]=useState(null);const generarQR=async()=>{const resp=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/generate-qr',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({id_reserv:'jAJ8Ks',tables:'1010'})});const data=await resp.json();setQrUrl(data.qrUrl);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:generarQR,children:"Generar QR"}),qrUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:qrUrl,alt:"C\xF3digo QR"})]});};export default QRViewer;
